project_descr: This projects aims at strengthening the capacity of the Government of Ethiopia to observe, analyze and forecast climate information to enhance their early warning systems and for climate resilient development and adaptation to climate change.

outputs.output_descr: Capacity of key sectors strengthened for accessing and make use of climate information
